channel.title: A Court Wizard finally fulfilled "The Dream"
channel.description: Courtesy of @Harmony , if you're here. The [Court Wizard](https://tol.wikia.com/The_Court_Wizard) used _Pants on Fire_ to backfire the next ability ... and the [Assassin](https://tol.wikia.com/The_Assassin) POISONED himself!! https://tol.wikia.com/The_Court_Wizard https://tol.wikia.com/The_Assassin

item.title: A Court Wizard finally fulfilled "The Dream"
item.dc:creator: Nerbins
item.description:
How did it take this long for this to happen? How many games has there been? Was this the first one, no doubts? But still, good job, court wizard of this game.

Read full topic
item.source: A Court Wizard finally fulfilled "The Dream"
